gaussian.description: Performs a gaussian blur. Useful to remove Gaussian noise.

median.description: Performs a median blur. Useful to remove salt-and-pepper noise.

blur.description: Performs a blur to remove noise.

threshold.description: Performs a hard threshold with a user-defined global value.

otsu.description: Otsu's method tries to find an optimal threshold. This pairs well with a prior Gaussian blur.

mean.description: The threshold value is the mean of the neighbourhood area minus the constant 'c'.

gaussian.description: The threshold value is a gaussian-weighted sum of the neighbourhood area minus the constant 'c'.

threshold.description: Performs a threshold on each pixel. Turns each pixel into either 'black' or 'white'.

edge_detect.description: Performs the Canny edge detection. This will need some playing around.

iterations.description: The number of times dilation is applied.

dilate.description: Performs dilation on an image by using a specific kernel.

iterations.description: The number of times erosion is applied.

erode.description: Performs erosion on an image by using a specific kernel.

find_contours.description: Finds contours in a binary image.

accuracy.description: The maximum distance between the original contour and its approximation.

smooth_contours.description: Approximates a contour shape to another shape with less number of vertices depending on the accuracy.
